actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 93-138.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #128 (368-9).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Labor and Public Welfare with amendment, S. Rept. 93-271.

official_title: A bill to extend and make technical corrections to the National Sea Grant College and Program Act of 1966, as amended.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Authorizes appropriations of $30,000,000 for fiscal year 1974, $40,000,000 for fiscal year 1975, and $50,000,000 for fiscal year 1976, for the National Sea Grant College and Program Act. Sets forth circumstances under which the Secretary of Commerce may reduce or eliminate matching fund requirements under the Act for supporting programs relating to the development of marine resources. Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce, through the National Sea Grant College Program, to undertake a study of the means of sharing, through cooperative programs with other nations, the results of marine research useful in the exploration, development, conservation, and management of marine resources. Authorizes an appropriation of $200,000 for conducting such study.

titles.title: A bill to extend and make technical corrections to the National Sea Grant College and Program Act of 1966, as amended.
